snippet.title: Module 2: Shadowmantle is live in Neverwinter!
snippet.description:
http://nw.perfectworld.com

We're excited to announce that Module 2: Shadowmantle, the next content expansion for Neverwinter, is now live! Log in to explore the new adventure zone, the Dread Ring, and face Valindra Shadowmantle herself. We've also introduced many new in-game systems and features! Log in now and check it out.

Play Neverwinter for free at http://www.playneverwinter.com
